name: Duality Dark
description:
Spot the difference- but horror

Duality dark is a game where you're stuck in a nightmare, you don't know what around you is real - and what is not. Use your magical flashlight to find out what's real before you go insane!

Use flashlight over an object to see what it looks like in reality, if it looks different under a flashlight interact with it to return it to reality. Return all objects in scene to their real states before your insanity meter reaches the end... Or go insane for good!

Turn on flashlight by pressing [F]

Interact with items by pressing [E] when in front of one.

Use your flashlight to keep enemies off of you.

Programming: Nathan Domogala, Salomon Kolehmainen

Art: Bryan Morris(Neo2020), Cleo (Hexy)

Audio / Sfx:  Jordan Trucano
